amendment.description: Amendment sought to authorize $10 million of the revenue generated by the underlying bill for the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to use existing authority to limit speculation in energy markets.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 10 printed in House Report 113-493 to authorize $10 million of the revenue generated by the underlying bill for the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to use existing authority to limit speculation in energy markets.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 223 (Roll no. 366).
